page.title: 08LOCAL SHOPS WEST LEEDS,
page.content: The newest shop on the parade is an estate agent. It is also an area office for the Leeds Permanent Building Society. It opened seven months ago and people find it convenient to save their money here, as there is no bank in the immediate area. The office staff report business as brisk, with semi-detached houses the most popular on the market. A local couple have owned the greengrocer's shop for the past four years. As well as flowers, fruit and vegetables, pet food and accessories can be purchased here.Fresh produce is collected early each morning from the market in Leeds, but bulky and refrigerated goods are delivered by lorry. Although these shops serve the community they face competition from a local supermarket.
